pros: Receptive to most adhesives and can be glued to any surface
Beveled edges protect surfaces from scratching
cons: Can leave a stain, so we recommend wiping or rinsing them off before touching a surface

customer_reviews.title: small, strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: I bought magnets for my son to hang up his posters in his room. My husband put up metal strips on his walls so that magnets would work. These magnets are strong but small. He puts about 4 along the top of the posters to hang them up, but they are big posters. Maybe he doesn't need as many as that, but it looks fine and he is happy having his posters up. edited : I purchased more of these magnets to hang pamphlets up on notice boards. They are strong, and even if they break in half, they still hold up the pamphlets and brochures.
customer_reviews.author: Gail J.

customer_reviews.title: They don’t really look like the picture and when you touch them black carbon ...
customer_reviews.text: A couple of these broke during shipping. They don’t really look like the picture and when you touch them black carbon comes off on your fingers. I guess they’ll do, but if you need something cleaner, order something else.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Haferman

customer_reviews.title: Do not fear these little puppies work great!
customer_reviews.text: Great little magnets. Almost couldn't get them out of the mailbox...
customer_reviews.author: Legome

customer_reviews.title: I like how these are thinner and have a smaller footprint ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought magnets on Amazon before, and they were just as strong, but about 20% bigger. I like how these are thinner and have a smaller footprint for sticking photos to the fridge, and they're just as strong. More than I'll ever need
customer_reviews.author: Nate and Jen

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed. They’re totally weak!
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality. Not at all as described. I wish I could rate these -5 stars. Too weak to hold up anything, except maybe a darn piece of thread! Of course, when I realized I couldn’t use them at all, not even to hold up a small, thin piece of paper on a solid metal door (!), I bought a different brand that work beautifully, and forgot to return these before the return period ended. I’m sure the seller counts on that, especially since they’re not expensive. Very disappointing. I wish Amazon would ban sellers like this.
customer_reviews.author: NYC-CreativeLady424

customer_reviews.title: Magnets - What do you expect
customer_reviews.text: Needed these to attach a laser to a printer. I'd expected a little more adhesion, but I bought cheap so it had a hard time holding my laser. Zip-ties solved that problem! For normal items, though, these do work well. I'd stuck the magnets to a wall and they did what I'd expect. I will warn you, the packaging was less than ideal which resulted in a few of them being broken. This didn't hurt my feelings as I only needed 1-2 magnets. Just as a heads up if you need the exact amount. I'd guess I'd blame Amazon for that and not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnets for a project. I made 280 magnets for an event. The magnets were made by using 2X2 wood pieces and decoupage. I was skeptical about these magnets ability to be strong enough to hold the magnets in place. They are great! They are a little smaller than I wanted but I am glad I got them. When I tested them using my refrigerator, they held very tightly and did not slide or come off easily, even when holding a paper behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Amaw

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are not very strong.
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are pretty weak. You could use them for crafts or something like that to attach little trinkets to a frig. but thats about all they are good for. If you are looking for a strong magnet this is NOT it. For what they are they are fine, they are packaged well enough and they are relatively inexpensive but just don't expect much holding power.
customer_reviews.author: timdtoolman

customer_reviews.title: These disc magnets are great for holding things on a whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised. These disc magnets are great for holding things on a whiteboard. The only thing that could be better is their durability, they will break if falling from a 3 ft height from the floor. But, for the price it is fine
customer_reviews.author: Qbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition.  Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews about some of the magnets being broken/ fragile or packaging damaged but my order arrived in perfect condition. The magnets are small but strong. I got them to hang preschool art papers on the chalk board and just one of the tiny magnets will secure a whole paper no problem. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: celesteskycop

customer_reviews.title: Very weak magnet. I used it to secure something ...
customer_reviews.text: Very weak magnet. I used it to secure something and it was so weak that the smallest touch knocked it off.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Aunt who was making an acrylic paint pour project that makes 2' fridge magnets once they are dry and the magnetic strip she bought to cut the magnets for the back just didn't hold anything on the fridge. So I bought these for her, and she said they work great!! She loves them- they are strong and made the project look very professional. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: N. West

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had these long ago
customer_reviews.text: Love these magnets. I am planning to use them in making refrigerator magnets. The size is perfect for other craft applications. In fact I saw on HSN lately selling a fashion accessory that used magnets. So I'll probably use the magnets that way also. Service was excellent and I'll very likely purchase from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: histeach76

customer_reviews.title: Nice average strength magnets.
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are nice and a good size. However from the description I thought I was getting the super stong magnets, they are not. I will still find use for them They are nice just not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamom

customer_reviews.title: Messy and not strong
customer_reviews.text: I am planning on returning these if I am able. I was looking for strong magnets to hold through fabric and they weren't strong enough even though this came up as the suggestion when I was looking for strong magnets. They also leave a dark residue on your hands after handling them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Buzzi

customer_reviews.title: Hirrible product
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible my baby playes with them on the fridge 9 of them broke. I wanna return them I want a refund choking hazzard for dog too after my dog put it in her mouth. This should be recalled I want to send them back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: OK for fridge magnets
customer_reviews.text: They’re magnets and they stick and there’s a lot of them in the box. They’re strong enough to hold pictures onto the fridge door, but not strong enough to hold some Reflectix in place over camper windows, which is what I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Montanna

customer_reviews.title: not very strong
customer_reviews.text: magnets are low price but in this case you get what you pay for. Not very strong
customer_reviews.author: Cooperbrowdy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, packaging inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, got exactly what we were looking for. We’ve ordered these twice and got two different boxes of the same product. The product was fine but the first time we got a super beaten up box, like it had been around for decades or was resold to us after someone returned it. The second was clean so I didn’t drop the rating, and both times the actual product was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use them to hang the kids' schoolwork and artwork. Most magnets these days barely hold a sheet of paper. These hold a decent amount of weight. A lot of good magnets for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: dspguy

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my chemistry class to use during a lab. They were very strong and were even picking up sand that had a minimal amount of Fe in it. Be careful if you put these on a flat surface, as it grabs and holds and is a pain to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Waterfield

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Normal magnetic strength for the size (between a dime and a nickel). I used them on the bottom of pots of glitter to stick to a sheet of steel. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Quwinntessa Starber

customer_reviews.title: these are great little magnets
customer_reviews.text: these are great little magnets. I'm using them to hold no-see-um netting to the windows of my SUV when we are camping. And they can hold all kinds of other things to the car and equipment on a temporary basis. put a piece of duct tape over the magnet to keep it from scratching the paint and to make it easier to grab.

customer_reviews.title: not THAT strong
customer_reviews.text: So these are good but not that good. They'll work fine to hang posters and things that arent moving, put stuff on your fridge etc. But hold something that will have any dynamic force? Nope. I need these to hold some clothing shut and they dont work with anything between them thicker than 1 or 2 sheets of paper.

product_meta.title: (75 Pack) Ceramic Industrial Magnets -11/16 Inch (.709) Round Disc - Ferrite Magnets Bulk for Crafts, Science & Hobbies - Grade 5-75 pcs/Box! by Clout Science É
product_meta.description: This offer is for a Wholesale Priced Package of 100 Magnets. 11/16 Inch (.709" or 18mm) Round x 3/25" (.12" or 3mm) Thick Flat Disc Magnets have good holding power! Grade 5 Ceramic composition. Great for all craft and hobby applications. Can be glued onto any surface. Dimple marks North Pole so applying correctly is a breeze! These inexpensive disc magnets are commonly called Ceramic Craft Magnets and are solid strontium ferrite discs. These are high quality and strong for their size. These are receptive to most adhesives including hot glue, E6000, Goop, Bond 527, Liquid Nails, 2 part epoxies and more. Great for making refrigerator magnets, bottle cap magnets, small signs, magnetic buttons, and more! As with all of our products these magnets are brand new and factory fresh. Edges are slightly beveled so they do not scratch surfaces. North Pole side of magnet is marked so you can apply the magnet easily to the correct side. See our other listings for larger quantities, other sizes and adhesive for mounting. NOT A TOY, Keep Away From Children.
feature_bullets: Grade 5 Ceramic Disc Magnets are strong and measure 11/16 Inch (.709" or 18mm) Round x 3/25" (.12" or 3mm) Thick.
Great for all home, office, craft, hobby, science projects and product manufacturing applications.
Flat Disc Magnets with Beveled Edges to protect surfaces from scratching like other inferior brands do.
North Pole side of magnet is marked so you can apply the magnet easily to the correct side.
Not a toy, for craft, science or production use only.
